de.btu.openinfra.backend.rest.solr

Class SearchResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.btu.openinfra.backend.rest.solr.SearchResource

  • @Path(value="/v1/search")
@Produces(value={"application/json;qs=.5;charset=UTF-8","application/xml;qs=.8;charset=UTF-8"})
@Consumes(value={"application/json","application/xml"})
public class SearchResource
extends Object
    This class represents and implements the Search resource.
    Author:
    BTU DBIS

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchResource

        public SearchResource()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @POST
public SolrResultPojo get(@QueryParam(value="language")
                      String locale,
                      @QueryParam(value="start")
                      int start,
                      @QueryParam(value="rows")
                      int rows,
                      SolrSearchPojo searchPojo)
        This resource awaits a SolrSearchPojo that will be the base for a search request on the Solr index. The parameter UUID and TRID of the SolrSearchPojo must not be set.
        Parameters:
        locale - The language of the search request as string.
        start - The offset parameter for the results.
        rows - The count of results that should be returned.
        searchPojo - The SearchPojo that contains the request.
        Returns:
        A SolrResultPojo that contains the result, a query time and a count of the retrieved results.

      • index

        @POST
@Path(value="/index")
public boolean index(SolrIndexPojo projects)
        This resource starts the process that generates the Solr index. The specified SolrIndexPojo can contain a list of project ids the index should created for. If the list is empty all projects will be indexed. The parameter UUID and TRID of the SolrSearchPojo must not be set.
        Parameters:
        projects - The SolrIndexPojo that contains the list of project ids that should be indexed.
        Returns:
        True if the process was successful.

      • getSuggestion

        @GET
@Path(value="/suggest")
public List<String> getSuggestion(@QueryParam(value="q")
                                  String qString)
        This resource provides a suggestion on the Solr index for a specified query string.
